1.0.0.name: wordpress/sticky-ecommerce-targeted-offer-discount-widget
1.0.0.description:
Instant Demo of Sticky Announcements on your site addsticky.com/demo

Installation is as easy as creating a FREE account at addsticky.com/wordpress/free, customizing your Sticky Widget, then copy/paste one line of Javascript straight to your WordPress admin interface.

Easiest way to target customers with discounts based on where they are on your site and if they’re trying to leave without buying. Great way to decrease shopping cart abandonment!

Sticky Discounts is a great tool for converting users abandoning your checkout, product pages, and landing pages. Also very effective in driving sales around specific products or categories.

Show Sticky when:

  • People arrive to your site
  • People try to leave your site. (We use intent technology to know if their leaving the site or not)
